wikitext.*:
'''Line of Durin''' is an Oregon-based black metal band who create music based on the works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]. They have released two albums, [[Line of Durin (album)|Line of Durin]] in 2019 and [[Ever Homeward]] in 2022.
